author: CMS-LUMI-POG
body:
Pileup scenario for UL 2017 5 TeV production. Using a min bias cross section of 65 mb and the latest luminosity calibration from LUM-19-001, the luminosity-weighted distribution of bunch-by-bunch pileup is calculated. Some more information and plots [here.](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1077982/#10-pileup-scenario-for-5-tev-2) Needed for this [JIRA ticket](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/PDMVMCPROD-34).

Same as PR #35320 but for master.
title: Pileup profile for UL 2017 5TeV
